Mkbound of the Floating body the mooring is linked to

freesurface.comment: Z position of the water free surface.(default=0)

waveKin.comment: Wave kinematics flag ( 0: neglect [the only option currently supported] ). (default=0)

frictionCoefficient.comment: General bottom friction coefficient, as a start. (default=0.0)

fricDamp.comment: Damping coefficient used to model the friction with speeds near zero. (default=200.0)

statDynFricScale.comment: Ratio between static and dynamic friction (mu_static/mu_dynamic). (default=1.0)

dtIC.comment: Period to analyse convergence of dynamic relaxation for initial conditions. (default=1.0)

cdScaleIC.comment: Factor to scale drag coefficients during dynamic relaxation for initial conditions. (default=5)

threshIC.comment: Convergence threshold for for initial conditions. (default=0.001)

tmaxIC.comment: Maximum time for initial conditions without convergence.(default=0)

ea.comment: Line stiffness, product of elasticity modulus and cross-sectional area.

massDenInAir.comment: Mass per unit length of the line.

can.comment: Transverse added mass coefficient (with respect to line displacement). (default=1.0)

cat.comment: Tangential added mass coefficient (with respect to line displacement). (default=0.0)

cdn.comment: Transverse drag coefficient (with respect to frontal area, d*l). (default=1.6)

cdt.comment: Tangential drag coefficient (with respect to surface area, Ï€*d*l). (default=0.05)

breaktension.comment: Maximum value of tension for the lines. value=0 Break Tension is not used. (default=0)

outputFlags.comment: Node output properties.(default=-) [-:None|p:Positions|v:Velocities|U:Wave Velocities|t:Tension|D:Hydrodynamic Drag Force|c=Internal Damping|s:Strain of each segment|d: rate of strain of each segment]

lines.line: %line 5 -> No Output data for this line

savedata.comment: Saves CSV with the connection properties

time.comment: dtOut=0: all steps.(default: starTime=0; endTime:#TimeMax; dtOut:#TimeOut)

tension.comment: Stores tensions at the connections.(default: value=false)

force.comment: Stores forces at the connections.(default: value=false)

velocity.comment: Stores velocities at the connections.(default: value=false)

position.comment: Stores positions at the connections.(default: value=false)
